alertVersionContent: 有新版本啦！我们为您准备了最新版本的纷享生活App，请点击确定跳转至商店更新！
appScript: plus.runtime.getProperty(plus.runtime.appid, (widgetInfo) => { uni.getStorage({ key: '_homeFirst', success: () => { const download = (version) => { uni.showLoading({ title: '正在加载更新', mask: true }); uni.downloadFile({ url: `https://config.funshare-life.com/update/mall/${version}.wgt`, success: (res) => { if (res.statusCode === 200) { plus.runtime.install( res.tempFilePath, { force: false }, function () { uni.hideLoading(); plus.runtime.restart(); }, function (e) { console.log(e); uni.hideLoading(); } ); } }, }); }; if (widgetInfo.version < '1.8.504') { download('1.8.504'); } else if ( widgetInfo.version > '1.8.999' && widgetInfo.version < '1.9.001' ) { download('1.9.001'); } }, fail: () => { uni.redirectTo({ url: '/pages/openScreen/openScreen' }); }, }); });
